html: Isaiah 56:12. Come ye, say they—Unto their brethren, fellow-priests, or other jolly companions. We will fill ourselves—We will drink, not only to delight, but even to drunkenness, as the word signifies. And tomorrow shall be as this day, and much more abundant—Which shows their dreadful security and contempt of God, and of his judgments, and their abandoning of all care of their own or the people’s souls.
